name: Modern Army Sniper Shooter 2
description:
Modern Army Sniper is back with another exciting single shot game that will surely blow you away. Modern Army Sniper 2!
Featuring multiple challenging missions and assignments to keep you on your toes with non-stop explosive action!
Eliminate enemies in their strongholds, defend your bases, engage in acts of sabotage, identify and neutralise enemy double agents within your ranks, kill high value targets to weaken or destroy the enemy war effort and much much more; all within beautifully crafted realistic 3d environments.
Features:
*Single shot gameplay
*Tons of exciting and challenging missions with explosive action
*The best Modern Sniper Rifles with a massive upgrade list
*Realistic 3d environments with day/night ambience
Test your shooting skills and download the best game you will ever play!
